Collection.LongName: MISR L1B2 Ellipsoid Product subset for the SAMUM region
Collection.DataSetId: MISR L1B2 Ellipsoid Product subset for the SAMUM region V003
Collection.Description: This file contains Ellipsoid-projected TOA Radiance,resampled at the surface and topographically corrected, as well as geometrically corrected by PGE22 for the SAMUM_2006 theme.
Collection.SuggestedUsage: MISR Level 2 TOA/Cloud retrievals require the radiances from all 9 cameras of MISR to be projected to a surface defined by the reference WGS84 ellipsoid.It is on this surface camera-to-camera stereo matching will be performed to determine cloud altitude. Topographic distortions are removed.Corrections due to errors in the supplied Navigation and attitude data are obtained during Terrain-projected parameter processing and are applied to these parameters.
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: The data used in this study were produced by the MISR Science Team;processed/stored at the Langley DAAC;Product is the MISR Level 1B2 ellipsoid-projected Radiance parameters for the SAMUM region;See ProductionDateTime for published date.
Collection.RestrictionComment: Data may not be reproduced or distributed without including the CitationForExternalPublication for this product included in this Metadata.Data may not be distributed in an altered form without the written permission of the MISR science team.

Contact.HoursOfService: 8:00 A.M. to 4:30 P.M., U.S. Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, excluding U.S. holidays.

Address.StreetAddress: NASA Langley Research Center, Mail Stop 157D

Address.StreetAddress: NASA Langley Research Center, Mail Stop 157D

Platform.LongName: First EOS Polar Orbiting Satellite, 10:30 AM Descending Equator Crossing

Characteristic.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristic.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

Characteristic.Name: OrbitInclination
Characteristic.Description: Angle between the orbit plane and the Earth's equatorial plane

Characteristic.Name: SwathWidth
Characteristic.Description: The width of the sensor scan as the satellite moves along the ground track.

Sensor.LongName: Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Nadir Viewing Camera A
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Fore Viewing Camera D
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Fore Viewing Camera C
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Fore Viewing Camera B
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Fore Viewing Camera A
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Aft Viewing Camera A
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Aft Viewing Camera B
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Aft Viewing Camera C
Charge Coupled Devicebased Pushbroom Aft Viewing Camera D

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SP_AM_PATH_NO
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number in the range 1-233 represents path number within EOS repeat cycle.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SP_AM_MISR_StartBlock
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Integer number within the MISR data coverage blocking scheme of block in which granule data STARTs; range 1-180; default 1.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SP_AM_MISR_EndBlock
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Integer number within the MISR data coverage blocking scheme of block in which granule data ENDs; range 1-180; default 180.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SP_AM_MISR_ProductVersion
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Integer number corresponding to the product version field within the local granule id of the MISR products. Will support the production rule that selects dynamic inputs based on the product version number.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SP_AM_MISR_FieldList
AdditionalAttribute.Description: List of MISR parameter field names within the current granule

CollectionAssociation.CollectionUse: Instrument characterization,pre-flight calibration,in-flight calibration data,and configuration parameters
MISR Level 1B2 co-registration and georectification Correction Dataset
